item.title: Reform U.K. Wins Special Election in Runcorn by Just 6 Votes
item.description: Nigel Farage’s right-wing populist party snatched a critical parliamentary seat from the governing Labour Party.

item.title: For the U.S. and China, the Only Talking Is About Whether to Talk
item.description: The standoff over terms of negotiations, and whether they are happening, signals that a protracted economic fight lies ahead.
